segments.text: I've been at this for two weeks now and nothing ’ s turned up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're right . I think it ’ s time to seek professional help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know you don ’ t want to pay for a job , but I think it ’ s time we consulted a headhunter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ re right , I don ’ t want to pay , but I don ’ t want to live without pay , either .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ha , ha , ha ! I agree . That ’ s not much fun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have anyone in mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cooke & Co . does a lot of placements in your field .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ya , they do . Anyone else come to mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at the moment , but I ’ ll let you know .
segments.speaker: S2
